lines.text: [the heroes bring the Stormqueen before her subjects]
Supremacy of one sex over the other is evil, and it's also ridiculous, as we will now show you.
[Zar tears off the Stormqueen's robes, revealing her secret]
[the shocked villagers either laugh or gasp]

[laughing]
After all, behind every great woman, there's a man.
People of Ishtan, listen to me! You can't blame me for being born a boy. My mother made me do it. So I can be queen too.
